title: Too violent for children under 8
review:
There are three scenes that parents need to know about:
  • The bar room brawl.
  • The 'Starship Troopers' (rated R) like battle between the Ants and the 'Bugs'-similar termites, including the death-farewell with the decapitated head of Z's war buddy.
  • The beating and interrogation of Weaver.
This movie should have been rated PG-13, like 'Small Soldiers' was, instead of PG.
